name: Sash of Knives
flavorText: “Keep your friends close, and your enemies within dagger throwing range.” Vis-Jaq’taar saying.
flavorTextHtml: “Keep your friends close, and your enemies within dagger throwing range.” Vis-Jaq’taar saying.

secondary.textHtml: With every attack, you throw a dagger at a nearby enemy for 622% weapon damage as Physical. [500 - 650]%
